powerpagecomponent.content: {"description":"The default number of unauthenticated login attempts from an IP address before the IP address is blocked for Authentication/LoginThrottling/IpAddressTimeoutTimeSpan if the attempts occur within Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxAttemptsTimeLimitTimeSpan amount of time. Default: 1000","value":"1000"}
powerpagecomponent.name: Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxInvaildAttemptsFromIPAddress
